file_content.text: The DX annihilator network continues monitoring the Republic retreat. Hold all queries.
Facial recognition scanning complete. Matching records from "Ukabi incident" datafile.
Facial recognition scanning complete. Matching records of Imperial operative profiles.
DX annihilator network online. Interface activated. Opening holochannel....
Congratulations are in order. Republic forces have fled the research complex, broken and demoralized. Even better, the few survivors don't know it was us.
Their unlucky friends know all too well. I was the last thing they saw.
The dead ones do.
I can never tell if you enjoy your work. Always so grim.
I enjoy few things more than breaking and demoralizing. One could say it's my life's work.
This was a pleasure.
May you have a long and happy career.
Not many can inflict the kind of damage we did. The Republic's smart. They'll piece it together quick.
They'll figure it out.
Knowing and having proof are two different things.
The enemy's advanced research is now ours. Imperial Intelligence will put that technology to better use.
We gained valuable data, too.
The data is already on its way to Dromund Kaas. The Republic's loss is our gain.
It only takes one witness.
How can you be sure?
We're monitoring Republic comm frequencies--even the coded ones. They send emergency alerts in the event of an Imperial attack. They haven't.
This operation was a masterpiece. It's a shame we can't sign it.
Anonymity is such a waste.
Cheer up. When the last Republic world falls, everyone will know we are responsible.
Imperial celebrations are premature. The DX annihilator network has exposed secret Republic allies and backup operations.
Calculations indicate a complete enemy recovery within one standard month. The Empire must invade the Network Access annex and eliminate all threats.
We've come too far to give the enemy a second chance. Let's finish this.
Our mission isn't over.
After all the damage we inflicted, how could they compensate so quickly?
Could they recover that fast?
We don't want to find out. The Dark Council won't tolerate failure.
When was the last time you had a memory wipe?
Your circuits are faulty.
Don't blame the droid. Clearly, the Republic is more entrenched on Nar Shaddaa than we realized.
Tell us everything about the enemy's hidden position--starting with how we get there.
A secure turbolift on this level will transport directly to the objective. Shadow Syndicate and Imperial Intelligence personnel are converging to assist you.
Do we really need help from a criminal organization that tried to betray us?
That syndicate is dangerous.
The Republic must not be allowed to regain its strength.
Never heard of the Shadow Syndicate. What is it?
"Shadow Syndicate"?
A coalition of the most powerful organizations on Nar Shaddaa. Allies to the Empire.
The DX annihilator network's assistance won't be forgotten.
You've been useful, droid.
Record of this coalition will persist in our memory banks as well.
The plan is to kill everyone. We don't need extra targets in the cross fire.
They'll just be in the way.
We have no idea what's awaiting us. Knowledge is power--acquire some before you attack.
Coordinate with our allies and rout the enemy--but be mindful we maintain discretion. Zavrasha out.
Transmitting secure turbolift coordinates and Shadow Syndicate contact profile. DX annihilator network continues monitoring the Republic retreat. Will advise if new data becomes available.
The DX annihilator network is collating data. Hold all queries.
